name: Pastel Simon
description:
A cute, pastel twist on the beloved Simon toy! Follow along with the sequence provided by the toy and press the buttons accordingly, and see how far you can go!

Developed in 48 hours for the Wholesome Games Game Jam #1.

Pastel Party Team
Programming: Dustb0 (Twitter)
Art: Risky (Twitter)
Sound: Amenemone (Twitter)
Music: ReverbInTheVoid (Twitter)
